As a killer main, this game is an all around good time for me

Going into it, I heard a bit about how the community can be a bit toxic to anyone playing the killer, which I mainly wanted to play, but it really hasn't been that bad. As long as you learn how to spread your attention around each survivor and avoid tunneling, you can have some fun great matches where all five participants in the match get some good scores and everyone walks away happy. Whether you play Killer or Survivor, just don't get too far ahead in the ranks and wait for the reset to put you back again after getting in a few hours if you REALLY want to avoid the salt fields.

Additionally, playing with friends will GREATLY enhance the experience, so definitely consider bringing one or two along for the ride and have some fun! I've owned the game for a little over a month so far and I've already got near 50 hours in, so I personally can say I've already got my money's worth out of it, although noting I picked it up on sale for $10
